# menu

**Type Property**

An action that appears in the Edit Menu when the user long presses a supported document.

## Declaration

```swift
static var menu: UIDocumentBrowserAction.Availability { get }
```

## Constants

- **navigationBar**: An action that appears in the navigation bar when the user puts the document browser in Select mode.

items.description: An action that appears in the navigation bar when the user puts the document browser in Select mode.
items.name: navigationBar
